website_summaries.verdict: This is a good option for people who cannot find the right length or strength in premade cords or who need an extra long length of bungee.
pros: Can be ordered in width from 1/4" to 3/8"
Designed to hold up in the water and weather
Allows you to use bungee cord for all kinds of DIY projects
cons: Some of the longer lengths may have shorter lengths knotted together on the spool

customer_reviews.title: strong bungee cord not suitable for masks
customer_reviews.text: This is very strong resilient round bungee cord. The yellow color is very vibrant, excellent for application where you want high visibility. I took a chance hoping I could use it for face masks for COVID protection. It will not work for that and cutting it open the fibers of elastic inside are too small for masks.
customer_reviews.author: Melodie B.

customer_reviews.title: USMC veteran review.
customer_reviews.text: First off, thank you for your service Devil Dog. Second, freakin’ awesome product. High quality shock cord. Received my package the next day. Couldn’t be happier. I’ll only be ordering my cord from you now. Semper Fi. 🦅🌎⚓️🇺🇸
customer_reviews.author: Surviving Sober

customer_reviews.title: Great for elastic shoelaces!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for shoelaces because, well, I'm lazy and don't want to tie my shoes all the time. This allows me to slip my shoes on and off with ease. I just cut an approximate length, lace my shoes, try them on, adjust the tension, and tie it off. I burn the ends to keep them from fraying, and I'm set!
customer_reviews.author: Coconut Earth Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Underquilt Project
customer_reviews.text: I tried sleeping in a Hammock while camping with the Boy Scouts. So not to be cold at night I made an underquilt that is a blanket held to the bottom/underside of the hammock. The elastic cord sold at the local sewing store was only 1/16" and was not strong enough. SGT Knots had the 1/8" shock cord I needed and it worked great. It was strong enough to keep the underquilt snug enough against the hammock and I was nice and toasty all week. Great products and I would highly recommend them. Thanks SGT Knots for saving my butt (from the cold)!
customer_reviews.author: JohnF

customer_reviews.title: Shocking ways to use 1/8” shock cord
customer_reviews.text: Have you ever made a great mistake? I did! I purchased 1/8” shock card when I should have purchased 1/4”. I only bought 50’ to string new shock cord for our tandem kayak. So, what do you do with 50’ of 1/8” shock cord you don’t need? My wife needed some elastic around the ankles of a pair of running pants. I decided to use some of the 1/8” shock cord on my backpack to hold my sleeping bag and bed roll. We gave 25’ to a friend that is making face masks for COVID-19. I never knew there were so many opportunities to use this quality shock cord!
customer_reviews.author: Walter Ahland

customer_reviews.title: Really nice cord, good price
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 10' piece of the Woodland Camo cord to secure a brown sunshade. We wanted to mount it straight out from the house, secured on two points to a storage shed and a tree to hold it straight over a glass patio door. This worked out perfectly, giving great shade, keeping the hot sun off the glass door, while giving an unobstructed view of the outdoors. I was so pleased with the camo color because it was such a great match for the shade itself and is not noticeable in our tree. The cord is great quality and should hold up well for a long time. It was easy to work with and customize with hooks.
customer_reviews.author: B. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: What are you waiting for?! Buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Exactly as described. Doesn't fray. I'm using it as shoelaces since these shoes are notorious for coming untied no matter how they are tied/laced. This cord fixed it and I can just slip them on! The owner of company is retired military which is great to help support someone that served our country! Definitely recommend ordering from them! Don't think twice, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: kbrents

customer_reviews.title: How do you measure 10 feet
customer_reviews.text: I placed an order for 10 feet of pink 3/16 cord. I got 10 feet of cord. One problem. It was in three pieces. Silly me I expected one
customer_reviews.author: John E Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great bungee and company Sgt Knots
customer_reviews.text: Nice bungee, with satin finish. Great company! Ordered 10ft of 1/8” in white but wish I’d ordered 1/4” and that light beige/camel color was available. Used to extend 3/4” diameter ball bungee for an exterior Coolaroo shade screen which only came with 3 inch long bungee cords. I needed extra long bungee cord to secure tie downs to patio side walls. Such a hassle trying to find a 3/4” diameter beige bungee ball to fit carrier. Really wish other companies would make 3/4" diameter ball bungee instead of 1-inch.
customer_reviews.author: Poppy

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as we had hoped
customer_reviews.text: Worked exactly as we hoped. We used it to build a toy holder for our kids' soft toys. So glad we bought the silver color because it does look like bars until you see them bend to hold the animals. We were able to easily knot the ends and used a lighter to sear the ends of the silver fibers to keep it from fraying. We were able to make about 22 "bars" on our 6 foot high structure and still had about 4 feet left over. Overall we were delighted with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MommyCrafts

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Stringing Blink Cameras Up In Trees!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff stretches easily around tree trunks or thick branches. The tiny Blink XT's or XT2 cameras are securely attached now with some zip ties fastened first around the camera, then a couple more zip ties holding them to the cord. They're far enough up to make detaching them difficult, but low down enough to make faces visible. If you want to put your wireless cam up in a tree, but didn't know how, this bungee cord solves the problem in just minutes. Update: This cord is hanging in there, doing its job and holding up the Blink camera with no problems. It's a marriage made in heaven.
customer_reviews.author: LoveThatRonWhite

customer_reviews.title: Great for Restringing Zero Gravity Chairs!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to redo my zero gravity chairs with and it worked great! I had more than enough for two chairs with one roll. The cord feels very strong and was easy to work with. I removed the old, broken pieces of cord from one chair, but left the other intact so I could see how it went together. I found it easiest to do one third of the chair, such as the seat, at once, restringing both sides at the same time, so the tension was right. I'm very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Cord
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time ordering bulk shock cord, but have used other pre-made cords for various purposes. The quality of this cord is as good or better than others I have used, has great color and feel to it. The only problem, entirely my fault, is that I should have measured first as the 3/16" is bigger than I expected and too large for a couple, but not all, of the projects I'm doing; that said, I'll be ordering some 1/8" cord from Sgt Knots in the next few days.
customer_reviews.author: R. Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Extremely good quality and true color
customer_reviews.text: I am using the neon yellow shock cord to add some color to a black sling bag and a black parka. The color is a perfect tone for neon yellow and is extremely sturdy. I used super glue to seal the cut ends and I believe that this cord will easily outlast the garments I am putting it on.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Used as stretchy shoelaces & LOVE them! ♥
customer_reviews.text: So I had bought actual stretchy laces a while back. They worked, but I was unhappy for 2 reasons: #1 expensive & #2 not as thick as I wanted. The brand I bought was 1/8" and are the same amount of stretchy as these. Instead of using supplied clips I tied them in a knot at the top anyway. So I bought this in a 3/16 and that was EXACTLY what I wanted for thickness! (Using in Doc Martens & Timberlands) If you want regular laces for regular shoes 1/8" is what you'd want.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M

customer_reviews.title: Bungee Cord on a Roll
customer_reviews.text: 100 feet of black bungee cord arrived on nice spool. Easy to unwind and use. Will use to construct a zoo cage for stuffed animals. My daughter saw the idea on Facebook. In that case, the creator used individual bungees and cut off the hooked ends. Buying 100 foot of bungee cord on Amazon is going to make this project so much easier. There are plenty of colors to choose from and diameter and length based on your project.
customer_reviews.author: Sheridan Ledbetter

customer_reviews.title: Shock Cord
customer_reviews.text: This Shock Cord worked great. I replaced the bungee cord inside my tent poles with the shock cord, and it was perfect. The old bungee was rotting and breaking, and we thought we would either need to replace the poles, or the entire tent. After finding this, re-stringing the poles, and trying everything out, I was very pleased. The tent is good as new, and the cost was considerably less than replacing it. Thanks for a good, strong product.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Traves

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this 1/4 inch cord to replace the stretched out bungie on the rear tank well of my Wilderness Ride 135 Kayak. It seems even better than the original cord that came with the boat. I use this area of the kayak for a crate with 5 rod holders so the bungie that holds everything together has to be strong and with good tension when stretched.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased used sit on top kayaks for the grand kids. They were older...in good shape...but had no shock cord to hold personal items. I ordered 25 ft. in black. Perfect fit for the eyelets and was enough to outfit both Yaks with a little left over. I will be reordering to replace my worn out shock cord on my 3 kayaks. Good, strong, high quality cord.
customer_reviews.author: ethlmertz

customer_reviews.title: NOT 3/16 size..they are 7/32.
customer_reviews.text: These sellers lie about their sizes. They have no idea how to use a drill gage to tell the diameters of their product, so they simply lie about it and label it the incorrect size. Avoid them at all costs. They have no idea how to measure the diameter of their bungee cord.
customer_reviews.author: RetiredNSmilin308

customer_reviews.title: The 1/8” & 3/16” black cords are amazing, just a great product!!
customer_reviews.text: The Marine grade Dacron polyester 100% stretch shock cords stretch and flex even under the 50-60mph winds I’ve experienced. I am using the shock cords to make ball bungee cords for a 10’x20’ car cover / canopy tarp with tarp side walls that have standard metal grommets. The ball bungees that come with the covers do not last long the shock cords wear out very fast and loose all elasticity then fail. I will always buy shock cord for what ever purpose I need from sgt knots period. Thank you for selling a superior product. 10 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This material just feels solid
customer_reviews.text: I got three different sizes in three different orders and they each arrived with no problems. They seem to be made of high quality materials. I’m in the process of replacing the stretch cords on my sit on top kayak. Over the years I have replaced some of the cords several time with materials purchased from marine hardware stores but that stuff has never lasted very long. This new material seems to be of much better quality. Time will tell
customer_reviews.author: JoeA

customer_reviews.title: Custom shock cords
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have been gearing up to do more kayaking and bicycling. We needed to refit an older kayak, as the existing cords were somewhat dry-rotted. I looked online and found various hooks and other fittings, then colored cord. With my own fittings and my own cord, I was able to customize the kayaks for the type of activity (exploring, fishing) we were planning to do! With fairly inexpensive (used) kayaks, we were able to produce vessels better suited to our plans than new vessels costing much more! Thanks, SGT KNOTS!
customer_reviews.author: RonN.

customer_reviews.title: Shock/elastic cord.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and was promptly delivered. I used it to restring two zero gravity chairs. It worked perfectly and the color matched very well. I am completely satisfied and would recommend this product and vendor to anyone needed elastic/shock cord.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Dweller

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I like this bungee cord; it's the second time that I have purchased it. It seems to stretch nicely and comes in a good variety of colors. I built a stuffed animal storage cage for my grandson and the bungee does a great job of holding back the stuffed animals. I purchased the bright orange 1/4 inch size. One thing to keep in mind when working with bungee cable in general is that when you cut it, you need to be careful that it doesn't frail to much or you'll need to cut it again depending how your are going to use it. I would use some tape wrapped around the cord where i'm going to cut the bungee.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Riccomini

customer_reviews.title: Looks better than original.
customer_reviews.text: This shock cord was purchased to replace the deck rigging of my new (1999 edition LOL) Pamlico 145t. The original shock cord/bungee was tired, stretched out, and plain black. All the manufactures use black it seems to me. I wanted a touch of color on the teal deck. I chose purple and it's perfect. I also purchased 3/8" line for perimeter line. Orange with reflective thread. Sgt Knots had the best choices of colors that I found. Now my boat has bright, contrasting accents that make it stand out.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph K. Willard

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as promised
customer_reviews.text: I went with SGT KNOTS because the other company that seems to have a ton of listings on Amazon had a fair number of poor reviews especially regarding how the cord was delivered and the accuracy of length. The SGT KNOTS reviewers all seemed to be satisfied with what they had received. I ordered 100 feet of black 3/16th inch stretch cord and that's exactly what I got. It came tightly wound on a spool and the length was correct. (Yes, I checked.) The cord stretch seems good and the outside seems durable, but that is something that will have to be checked during usage. I will update if the product should fall short of my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Andy B.

customer_reviews.title: Good price, quick shipping for pink shock cord
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a kit that included 10’ of pink shock cord and some hook ends for shock cord. All for kayaking. The items were fairly priced and arrived as described. I realized after the items arrived that I should’ve ordered 20’ instead, as I was a bit short. I may have to do that soon. I definitely recommend this seller and his products.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Diego

customer_reviews.title: Buy extra ... You will love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually our second purchase from these guys. We used the first cord on our ERG and it is true to its 100%stretch. Now we need some to secure a net and this cord is the most durable we have found! We love the color selection and the ability to buy in a variety of lengths. Not to mention it was delivered in record time! We love this product and you will too!
customer_reviews.author: J. Edelman

customer_reviews.title: High quality cord at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace all of the shock cord on my Kayak. Went with the lime green which looks great, very vibrant. There was plenty left over to make new paddle and rod leashes and some custom bungee straps for the bike as well. After a summer of sun, lake water, and abuse the cord still looks and feels brand new. I was a little disappointed the 50ft cord didn't come on a roll like pictured. I just wrapped the extra up like paracord and put it with my camping gear until I need some more bungees.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Great product for customized ear loops on cloth face masks
customer_reviews.text: I loved the product. It arrived on time and in great condition. Not to mention, the cloth face masks made were great as a result of the chords. The chords allowed more of a custom fit to the face with no bowing around the ears. Some people may not like the chord on their ears but I am so used to other types of face masks so this is not bad at all. Thank u very much for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: corey

customer_reviews.title: Practically indestructible (only the clips are not made in USA
customer_reviews.text: I’m using it in a potentially patentable product I call RETRIEVERS — variable length of shock cord with a bulldog style hinge clip on each end - clips to hem of glove and upper inside of coat/jacket pocket so you’re never without your gloves in chilly weather As I say,”Cold hands -no more— we’ve evened the score — RETRIEVERS ARETHE ANSWER!” GREAT FOR KIDS AND ALL ADULTS (think of it as the “dummy string” of the 21st century. — soon to be available nationwide !)
customer_reviews.author: Gere Miller

customer_reviews.title: Used in conjunction with a tarp to create a large patio cover
customer_reviews.text: Purchase the black cord and it worked exactly as intended. Threaded it through a tarp's grommet holes to cover a large patio set of furniture. Worked perfectly. I'll follow back after the winter season to augment review as to how it held up.
customer_reviews.author: cjcalif

customer_reviews.title: I've bought this 3/16" bungee cord to make custom tie-downs ...
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this 3/16" bungee cord to make custom tie-downs for backpacking. The diameter turned out to be very much what I was looking for, braided cover can be melted together with a lighter so the ends don't fray, Checked the cord elongation - it is a ted more than specified 100%, the force to stretch it is about 5lb. Package was delivered in a timely manner, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Shock Cords have been indispensable in my vehicles and boats for decades. I have made my own for most of this time with HD plastic hooks. This 1/4 inch cord is the best quality cord I have found. Very well made and stronger than some 3/8 inch cord I have. I do have one complaint. I would like SGT Knots to sell this cord in 3/8 inch. I know they have it because they market pre made marine grade bungees.
customer_reviews.author: BillB

customer_reviews.title: Very strong.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased from these guys in the past, I had no hesitation doing so again. The products are always first rate quality. These were actually a little bit small for my application using them on a backpack and I was worried they would not hold up. They exceeded my expectation and are still working well to this day.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Dave

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I found this on Amazon, not knowing it existed in spools (as opposed to just bungie cords with hooks at each end. I got the small 1/8" type due to wanting to create some bungie-nets for storing items in my truck camper. It works like a charm. I'm thrilled. BONUS: It came in red to match my truck! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: JanneZack

customer_reviews.title: Strong cord
customer_reviews.text: This is very strong cord with very little stretch. 12" stretches to about 15" easily and 17" with effort. EDIT: The cord held firm on our kayaks. The cord "gave" (38" stretched to 40") after being installed, stretched, and exposed to the elements for about a month, but it still had a good bit of stretch remaining. All we needed to do was tighten the cords in the hooks we had installed on the ends and the cord was as good as new.
customer_reviews.author: RMKM Family

customer_reviews.title: Fair price, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Smaller than I thought it would be - but that's my fault for not measuring, it'll still work fine. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne L

customer_reviews.title: UV resistant. Still good after 2 years in the weather
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for commercial crab pot door closures. It has been submerged in salt water for winter months, then stored outside in the sun and weather during the summer months. They are in their second and 3rd season and still going strong. I reordered more of this bungee for additional closures. They have proven to be durable. They didn't lose their elasticity. The neon green color faded a little, but this is extreme service. I am very happy with the product and will be ordering more. The seller filled my order quickly. It was well packaged for shipment I like the fact that the business is veteran owned and operated.
customer_reviews.author: S R

customer_reviews.title: Too large for surgical masks
customer_reviews.text: It was too big and sturdy for using to make surgical masks. The 1/4 inch diameter is too large, although the product is of excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Denis G

customer_reviews.title: good experience
customer_reviews.text: I'll do business with this company again, if needed- good service, prompt, and they seemed to WANT to do the right thing (and they did- there was no problem) good company. The product seemed decent enough- I used a very light diameter bungee cord for a extreme use, in sunshine,and exterior environment ...so pretty rough conditions, but it held up pretty well All things considered.
customer_reviews.author: doug

customer_reviews.title: More than enough for 2 Zero Gravity Chairs
customer_reviews.text: I used this to re string my zero gravity chairs. It worked very well. I had to figure out how to tie of the ends, but thanks to a few YouTube videos, I figured out how to use a washer. It was simple and saved my chairs! I am so glad. They are comfortable and I would hate to have to replace them right now. They are now as good as new (almost). There was more than enough to do two chairs completely! Great!
customer_reviews.author: BadBass

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This product was better than expected. The color selection was great. The elastic property seems superior. I do not know how the product will weather? The product this replaced is at least 4 times better (diameter 2/16 versus this product 4/16). I like what I received and I think it will do a better job. CHEERS
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Not as stretchy as I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I am making up bungee cords with reused plastic balls from this 500 foot roll. I was expecting the bungee to stretch to double the original lingth. It is strong, but doesn't stretch as much as the purchased bungees I recently bought. So not the best for replacement bungees, but I will go ahead and use up the 500 feet of camouflage bungee on this roll.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: Much bigger than I expected
customer_reviews.text: It is my fault that I didn't realize that 1/4" meant diameter and not circumference. It appears very durable. I'm not sure how I'll use it now, because it is too big for what I was planning to use it for - to make masks for health care workers and have them work like a swimmer's goggles with bungee cords. Since it is so durable and hefty, I'm sure there will be other projects where I can use it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Simpson

customer_reviews.title: 1/8 inch shock cord
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for repairing the shock cord in all my tents. Needed a substantial amount to replace rotted out tent poles for about 5 on my tents. Went to a camping store and they wanted a ridiculous amount by charging by the foot. I bought a couple of the 100 ft rolls , which was a reasonable price. Fit perfectly and did the job. Went and bought the 1/4 inch shock cord roll to have on hand and a hand full of clips & hooks. For in a pinch custom bungee cords and tie downs for odd ball items when needed. Totally satisfied with purchase, Have found many other uses for the cord. Planning to buy more in future.
customer_reviews.author: rocky pizano

customer_reviews.title: When you need a light duty but strong tie rope,  this is the rope for you!
customer_reviews.text: This rope I ordered was just the item I needed to use for tie downs for my sun shade. Years back I got an old milirary surplus parachute. I use it for a sun shade during events outside for different functions. This rope was perfect for the job for tieing the chute down. Love the color selection. And rapid delivery.
customer_reviews.author: The Sweet's

customer_reviews.title: Lasts longer than normal bungee cords
customer_reviews.text: This is great for replacing the original cord on bungee’s for my canopy. The cord that is used originally only lasts about a year, so when the cord rots, I replace it with this cord in the original plastic ball and they last about two years! I wish that the company that I purchased my original bungee’s from would use this quality of cord.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Tangled, flimsy and too stretchy
customer_reviews.text: So tangled I will never get it straightened. It stretches from 1" - 5" which does not work for masks which it was specified for. It is very loosely woven and not at all sturdy. It was an expensive waste of money. Do not buy this for any application.
customer_reviews.author: Judith A.

customer_reviews.title: Good, strong cord with plenty of "stretch.
customer_reviews.text: Good, strong cord with plenty of "stretch. I have some 1/8" cord, but wanted some cord with a bit more "meat" for heavier applications. The 3/16" cord fit the bill - the only downside was finding crimp type fasteners to make smaller connections then tying. But I did find some "crimping loop sleeves that would work well and used my vise to firmly attach to the cord ends.
customer_reviews.author: The Skipper

customer_reviews.title: The right stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to replace the elastic drawstring in my jacket, and it was perfect for the job. It was just the right thickness for the existing hardware and has the right amount of firmness and give. I love that I was able to find the color I wanted and it is nearly an exact match for the original. I only bought enough to make the repair, but next time I'll get some extra for emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: R. S. Home

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking in black.
customer_reviews.text: I used this to keep plastic bins in a rack in my RV. The cord is very nice looking and had good stretch for inserting and removing the bins. Bumps and hard turns (my wife thinks a Sprinter is a sports car) do not result in spills.
customer_reviews.author: James T. Brady

customer_reviews.title: Good for tent poles
customer_reviews.text: Used to replace elastic on North Face tent poles. North Face has a lifetime warranty, but that involves shipping the tent poles to ten, much cheaper and simpler to order new elastic. This worked well, only had it for a week, so I don’t how durable it is.
customer_reviews.author: Xenonym

customer_reviews.title: Shock Cord 3/16 inch - SGT KNOTS - Marine Grade Dacron Polyester Bungee
customer_reviews.text: Using cord outside to tie down sun shades and boat canopy. Appears to be good quality and does the job well. Cannot make a judgement on weather resistance, but Dacron Polyester is supposed to be weather resistant, so I expect it to hold up. Made two orders so far, and will order more as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Garvus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tent Pole Repair
customer_reviews.text: The product was exactly what I needed to restring a tent pole...I had several old dry rotted pole strings that needed replaced, the tent was in great shape but pole string had broken. The new string ordered worked perfectly, make sure you get the proper thickness for the pole you want to restring. If the string it too thick you wont be able to thread. I used a drop of dawn dish soap in the pole and tied the string to fishing line to thread through the pole, worked perfectly.....
customer_reviews.author: ajdajdajd

customer_reviews.title: Gerat shock cord
customer_reviews.text: Used this to separate my wife's dive computer from mine as they are the same model. Worked perfectly. Holds up well and is very comfortable on bare skin or over a rash guard. Could not be happier. I have not found another use yet, but I am sure I will find plenty as this will not go bad any time soon.
customer_reviews.author: Derek A. Peck

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Strong
customer_reviews.text: I purchase about 25 feet of this cord to replace the cord that was failing on a zero gravity lounge chair. The original cord was 1/8th inch and double threaded through the grommets. Using the 1/4 inch made restringing easier.
customer_reviews.author: David H. Gundersen

customer_reviews.title: So far, great.
customer_reviews.text: I use these to secure a boat cover. So far they have withstood the elements and maintained elasticity, which I can't say for the cords that I was using.
customer_reviews.author: Richie

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with execution of my order
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered four spools of this item only received three so I'm kind of disappointed regarding the execution of my order it was not fulfilled.. I do need the fourth spool if you can get it to us we would appreciate it I just hope my credit card was not charged for 4 spools when I only received three.. that would be a problem
customer_reviews.author: Nancie J. Gambino

customer_reviews.title: A different use
customer_reviews.text: I am using these to hold garden row covers in place. So far they are working great.
customer_reviews.author: Sueb

customer_reviews.title: bungee cord replacement on my kayak
customer_reviews.text: Bungee is a very versatile product, needless to say. I ordered 25' in orange just cuz what I replaced was black and my kayak is yellow. It is an easy job, but take a picture of the before and take it one step at a time to get the sequence of the pattern down. Tie a knot in the starting end and do one clamp at a time so you don't lose your place in the order. 25' was exactly enough to do both tiedowns fore and aft of the cockpit. time will tell how they hold up, but the original ones lasted many years so I expect I won't have to replace them anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: GEC1

customer_reviews.title: Great prices, fast shipping, great warranty and excellent product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Shock cord has hundreds of uses. I use the 1/8" for kydex wallets and other custom kydex orders that may require an elastic style rope. Plan on buying the thicker shock cord for our kayaks to add more on for better holds for my fishing crate and coolers, etc. Def. recommend to anyone needing shock cord.
customer_reviews.author: M. Roop

customer_reviews.title: Great colors and qua
customer_reviews.text: Boy Scout project. I was making cold weather fleece buffs for our scouting troop and needed to match our Kelly green troop color. This shock cord color matched, arrived very quickly, and was very high quality. I had to purchase more on short notice and it arrived the same as the first. Very happy with product and will be buying more when I made my hammock under quilt suspension!
customer_reviews.author: Shut Up & Hike

customer_reviews.title: Durable and good elasticity
customer_reviews.text: Great shock cord. I use it regularly for hunting, pack mods, replacing cordage on my kayak, and many other random things. Has a very rugged sheath. Vet owned business as well. Overall great product and will definitely be getting more.
customer_reviews.author: muskiemike217

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cord
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to restring 2 lawn chairs that cording had failed but the material and frame of the chairs were in good condition. The Shock Cord from Sgt. Knots was excellent. Durable strong, with the right give to restring my chairs. Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Delbert Antel

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for the job. I changed out the shock cords that attach to both sides of the roof on my hardside popup camper. I suspect that the cords will hold up for a long time. I'm totally satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ira

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality product, excellent company to deal with.
customer_reviews.text: The materials seem to be of very high quality. It's true, 100% stretch as claimed without sagging after rebound. I used the 3/16 inch size to replace the stretched out deck cords on a couple kayaks, couldn't get the 1/4 inch through the holes.....how do the kayak manufacturer do it? Any how, the 3/16 is very strong and is working well.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Great Replacement or Upgrade for Tent Shock Cord
customer_reviews.text: This cord appears to be higher quality than the original cord included with both REI and Coleman tents. It is a little tricky to replace old shock cord, but certainly worth it. Make sure and measure the diameter of the existing cord (that you're going to replace) before ordering. Or at least measure the inner diameter of your tent poles. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ninefruits

customer_reviews.title: Very Bright Yellow Bungee
customer_reviews.text: High quality bungee cord, bought 100 feet of the neon yellow, and I am super pleased with the quality, I use this for rigging stage scuba tanks, creating hold downs, and camping gear. Jacket holds up well (needs to be heat set after cutting) and internal rubber cords have decent stretch but are not too soft. So far this stuff has held up well. Will certainly buy again from this dealer.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lahm

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several different sellers trying to find bungee cord to re string tent poles. I have returned all except this one. The sizes are true to the description and the material looks, feels, and acts like new stock. Other ones seemed to be in a stock room for ages. You won't be disappointed with your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy W.

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Versatility
customer_reviews.text: The product quality and versatile uses for it seem to be endless. I wish I'd thought of purchasing it many years ago. All the odd-shaped outdoor furniture on my deck now has covers secured with just the right amount of cord. Workshop and garden tools are properly hung using small loops of cord easily connected and disconnected to hang on pegs. Next winter I'll be making cords to secure the cover on my small RV during storage and they'll be the proper length and number.
customer_reviews.author: oreddie

customer_reviews.title: Great business and great products and service.
customer_reviews.text: Product was great, will order again. Communication from company was very nice. They are a great company with excellent products from what we have experienced. The cord material has been perfect for the masks we are making and donating to medical front line.
customer_reviews.author: My humble opinion

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had in use long enough to give a true review but so far all is good. Seems a little pricey but a hell of a lot cheaper than I could make it myself so.... Happy I got it and shipping was quick..
customer_reviews.author: E. B. Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Great for a toddler stuffed animal zoo
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. I used it to build a stuffed animal zoo for my daughter. The cord is just large enough to get the job done. I was pleased with the quality and consistency of the cord through the whole roll. The color makes it look like bars, and the is a lot of stretch in the cord. I am not sure how much you can get out of say 3 feet, but it would be significant. I will get this again, if the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: Auburngrad

customer_reviews.title: Don't Upset the SGT!
customer_reviews.text: Damn! The SGT has been all up in my a$$ for a review! Don't fall behind and get your reviews in! All good with the product. Does just as I want with helping tie down some gear on a flat-pack board. Came packaged nicely and prompt. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Steve_K

customer_reviews.title: Uniform color and weave
customer_reviews.text: I used this cord to tension the edges of a canvas boat cover, because of its UV resistance claims. The sturdiness and durability will become evident only with time, so I gave those characteristics a 4 for now. It tensions well and is working well after three weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Seiler

customer_reviews.title: Seems very durable.
customer_reviews.text: I used this to replace the shock cord on my tent poles. I have a nice backpacking tent that gets used maybe once every two years, but time has not been nice to the original shock cords. This new cord did a nice job, and I have some left over after restringing 5 poles for tinkering with. Nice vibrant color too.
customer_reviews.author: Travelin'

customer_reviews.title: Handy!
customer_reviews.text: Very useful stuff. Once you have a roll of this, you start finding all kinds of uses for it. I made a tank-banger (scuba) with this and a golf ball. I cut some lengths for custom tie-downs in my SUV. I also bought 1/4" for heavier objects. I can tie a few pieces together for spider-bungee retainers for my boat and camper.
customer_reviews.author: Lars SveenTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, multiple uses, made in the USofA
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, made in the USofA. I use 550-syle shock cord for bootlaces, equipment tie-offs, lash-ups onto flexible or soft objects, the uses are endless. Running this particular cord as bootlaces on several desert tan boots, in all weather conditions and climates, for almost a year now. No issues. Still as flexible as when installed, and color-fast as well. SGT Knots delivery was flawless. Couldn't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: PaleoPatriot

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly what I needed to finish up the zoo I made for my daughter's stuffed animals. Anyone building a zoo this stuff works great. It has a great stretch to it, was easy to tie, and the color looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Zadees

customer_reviews.title: Great for tent poles!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my north face tent poles. It appears slightly thicker / more “robust” than the original shock chord. I spring for the polyester variety, should be better for long term durability. Will see how the material holds up over time....
customer_reviews.author: HappyCamper

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bungee cord to keep cats out of cabinets. We rescue and foster cats, recently, they have been getting into kitchen and vanity cabinets. Got this cord and spring locks, loop it around the door pulls. Works great, they can not out smart or out muscle this but it is on to the next challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy E Thompson

customer_reviews.title: excellent bungee cord
customer_reviews.text: just as described. Fair price, arrived quickly. Perfect fit for the bungee hooks I purchased. Though I'll have to put them together, I can customize the length and make a lot more for a lot less money then if I'd purchased "ready made" bungees.
customer_reviews.author: norwich34

customer_reviews.title: Great for restringing zero gravity chaise
customer_reviews.text: Used the 1/4 inch cord to replace the bungee cords on a LaFuma 'zero gravity' chaise. Works great, very pleased with the result! I needed about 30' to 35' for the full length chaise. I had ordered 25' and had underestimated the length I needed. Delivery was super fast. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Green Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Bungee Cord That Won't Disappoint
customer_reviews.text: We love this shock-cord! I purchased the 100 ft. spool because I was in the process of restringing our kayak. The shock-cord worked perfectly .We will definitely be purchasing another spool of this stuff in the future projects around the lake house.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: This is the stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the neon green. Tough cord! Seems much more durable than the original bungee on my kayaks. I ordered 50 feet which means I’ll have plenty extra. I’m sure I can find uses for it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Full 100% elongation
customer_reviews.text: Full elongation, so double the length. Clean ends that fit push on friction hooks perfectly. Everything I get from Sgt. Knots (ropes and cord) has been excellent. I love the color selection.
customer_reviews.author: Austinite

customer_reviews.title: Quality cord, holds stretch.
customer_reviews.text: I used this cord to make a stuffed animal cage for my daughter. The cord is of good quality and holds its tautness even after being stretched for a month. She loves putting her animals in their home now and clean up doesn't seem like as much of a chore for her. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: OddsAndEnds

customer_reviews.title: Great Bungee
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make some specific-sized bungee cords for my Tacoma. It worked like a charm. The cord seems sturdy. The advertised stretch is accurate. I recommend buying this for similar applications.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected also cats
customer_reviews.text: Used to replace shock cord on Kelty chair. It's nearly the same color as that which came with it and seems to have worked out quite well. Bonus: I tied a long piece to a bamboo stick, and the new cat toy was a huge hit with one of our cats who loves string.
customer_reviews.author: AHK

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my grandson’s zoo that we were making for him to keep his stuffed animals in. I wanted something stretchy so he could get the animals out easily but couldn’t find anything but parachute cord that was long enough .
customer_reviews.author: cecilia yowell

customer_reviews.title: Used for tent shock cord
customer_reviews.text: Much cheaper option than the little tent repair cord you can buy at sporting good stores and I imagine it will hold up longer too. The 1/8th inch fit in my REI Half Dome 2 tent but was hard to tie a knot and fit it back in the pole. Could have used a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Nickd

customer_reviews.title: I keep coming back for more
customer_reviews.text: Over time I've made several purchases of this 1/8" shock cord in different colors. All were evenly finished, well-made, and have held up well in (relatively light) use.
customer_reviews.author: BF

customer_reviews.title: couldnt find in brick n mortar
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I needed to secure a rain fly cover to a piece of play equipment. we get some big wind so I needed something that would move. Im a kite guy so I knew about shock cord. I looked locally and no one knew what shock cord was. Funny since anybody that has a bungie has used shock cord. Was glad to find quality cord for a good price in lengths I needed with quick delivery. This stuff is great for a lot of things and this seller was great. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Buyer Beware

customer_reviews.title: I bought the wrong stuff
customer_reviews.text: This product shipped rapidly! Beautiful color (purple) and looked substantial. Sadly it was not the right size for what I needed, my mistake, and I returned it. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Non-synthetic is better (no joke):
customer_reviews.text: Natural rubber really is a stretchier, more durable material capable of higher tension. The higher speck nylon casing combined with it make this a truly exceptional product. Really neat to see out of a small, US based merchant.
customer_reviews.author: Bitchinson

customer_reviews.title: Holds up to heat
customer_reviews.text: I've been rather impressed with this product so far. I wrapped it around the handguard of my AR and run it through 3 rifle classes. No melting or heat caused discoloration. This is some discoloration from dirt after it got dragged on the ground. Also, the shock cord came with a sticker, so now I have street cred with my nephew.
customer_reviews.author: Design Engineer 494

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cord to replace the old worn cord in my main tent poles. It arrived promptly and was as described. It was very easy to replace the cord in the poles.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Price more than reasonable.
customer_reviews.text: Having ordered bungee cords from local retailers and online from other sellers, the item is competitively priced. Have not tested the cord out yet, so no comment yet on durability and sturdiness.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Ben

product_meta.title: Shock Cord 1/8 Inch - SGT KNOTS - Marine Grade Dacron Polyester Bungee - 100% Stretch - Moisture, UV, Weather Resistant - DIY Projects, Tie Downs, Commercial, Indoor, Outdoor (100 feet - Black)
feature_bullets: SHOCK CORD - Top-quality, marine grade bungee cord with industrial level strength, stretch, and longevity. SGT KNOTS is the top choice for your rubber shock cord needs.

DACRON POLYESTER - Our proprietary design and construction provide long-lasting resistance to all-weather environments and UV rays. The 1000 denier Dacron polyester shell covering repels water and defies abrasion even better than nylon.
100% STRETCH - Guaranteed to hold elasticity longer than other bungee ropes and shock cords on the market. First extruded latex rubber holds a consistent 100% stretch and high modulus.

SIZE and COLOR - Bungee Cord length options: 10 feet, 25 feet, 50 feet, 100 feet, and 600 feet. Diameter thickness choices: 1/8 inch, 3/16 inch, or 1/4 inch. Our Elastic Cord is available in 20 colors: Black, Brown, Emerald Green, Hi-Visibility Orange, Kelly Green, Maroon, Midnight Blue, Neon Orange, Neon Green, Neon Yellow, OD Green, Pink, Purple, Red, Royal Blue, Silver, Tan, White, Woodland Camo, and Yellow.

VETERAN OWNED and OPERATED - Just like the Marine Corps, SGT KNOTS is committed to be the best of the best. We continue to live by the motto, Semper Fidelis-Always Faithful. Our loyalty to our customers is what makes us who we are, and the reason we continue to grow in popularity and product offerings. We promise to maintain the strength and consistency of our products. We also pass down our bulk savings to our customers.
